items.sentence: Tom said he didn\'t know how to swim very well.
Tom said he didn\'t want to waste time arguing.
Tom says he won\'t have to work overtime today.
Tom says that he doesn\'t want to eat anything.
You\'re not going to get any more help from me.
You\'re spending too much time on the computer.
You\'re the only person I can trust to do that.
You\'re wearing the clothes you wore yesterday.
That might be the reason Tom committed suicide.
That\'s most likely the reason Tom isn\'t here.
